list_definition.definition: to take on the financial responsibility for (a person, project etc), often as a form of advertising or for charity

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The firm sponsors several golf tournaments.

list_definition.definition: to promise (a person) that one will pay a certain sum of money to a charity etc if that person completes a set task (eg a walk, swim etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I’m looking for people to sponsor me for a charity fun run.

list_definition.definition: a person, firm etc that acts in this way.
